content.subtitle: Introduction
content.text: Cashback apps offer a great way to earn money on your everyday purchases. This guide reviews the best cashback apps available in 2024.

content.subtitle: Top Cashback Apps
bulletPoints: Rakuten: Earn cashback on online purchases.
Ibotta: Get cash back on groceries and more.
Dosh: Automatically earn cashback at thousands of stores.

content.subtitle: How to Maximize Your Earnings
content.text: To maximize your cashback earnings, make sure to use these apps consistently and combine them with credit card rewards.

content.subtitle: Introduction
content.text: Survey apps offer a simple way to earn money in your spare time. This article explores the top survey apps and how to maximize your earnings.

content.subtitle: Best Survey Apps
bulletPoints: Swagbucks: Earn points by taking surveys, watching videos, and more.
Survey Junkie: Get paid for sharing your opinions.
Google Opinion Rewards: Answer quick surveys and earn Google Play credits.

content.subtitle: Tips for Earning More
content.text: To increase your survey earnings, sign up for multiple apps and complete surveys as soon as they're available.
